text: Copying arrays manually is slower than System.arraycopy, patch changes this.
creator: dbrosius@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 17881
improve performance of Functor
creator: dbrosius@apache.org
sebb@apache.org
text:
Unless there are lots of entries in the arrays, I'm not sure that it is worth 
the effort, as the code is not quite as easy to follow.

Howwever, I fixed the code to only copy each entry once.
